title: Happy Family Vegetarian Restaurant - Rowland Heights
description: A familiar vegetarian restaurant established for many years in Rowland Heights. Food is mostly vegan, has many vege meat options, with a few dishes containing mayonnaise - ask your server. Offers cheap lunch specials daily: a main dish, soup, rice or bread all for around $6. Complimentary hot tea is served. Very quick service. Able to accommodate small or large parties. Parking onsite. Same owner as the Happy Family in San Bernardino and Costa Mesa.
